Html: The NuGet package for Prism depends on CommonServiceLocator. However, that package doesn't support Portable Class Libraries, now that there's a CommonServiceLocator that supports Portable Class Libraries can there be a portable Prism package that takes a dependancy on Portable.CommonServiceLocator?

Hi,

For those interested in adding this feature to the Prism library, I believe you could vote for it, in the following existing work item, so that the Prism team can analyze this future releases:

  • Take advantage of Portable Class Libraries 4.5

Regards,

Agustin Adami
http://blogs.southworks.net/aadami
I don't think this is what I'm looking for. Prism and CommonServiceLocator already have a PCL compatible version, it's just the way they're packaged in NuGet makes it hard to use.
